role_of_cos.l6_restrictions: No direct API calls to Publishing, Billing, or Orchestration layers

integration_rules.execution_constraint: No change applied unless initiated by L5-approved action template
integration_rules.hierarchy: L6 acts within L5 framework, not above it

sources: Stripe events, checkout sessions, cart status
Email events (opens, clicks, replies), campaign metadata
LinkedIn/website behavioral signals (page views, time on page)
Content corpus + Golden Archetype reference assets

propensity_to_pay_scorer.description: Assigns 0-100 Score to every contact based on behavioral signals
propensity_to_pay_scorer.l5_constraint: Cannot send messages. Only passes score to L5 CoS.
propensity_to_pay_scorer.l5_execution: CoS uses score to re-order To-Do list, calling Score > 90 leads first

sentiment_heatmap.description: Monitors LinkedIn Group posts and Email replies for emotional tone
sentiment_heatmap.l5_execution: Triggers advisory to L5 Marketing Agent for tone shift recommendations

shadow_challenger.description: Runs thousands of simulations to find better strategies
shadow_challenger.l5_constraint: Creates Hypothesis Report but changes nothing
shadow_challenger.l5_execution: You or L5 CoS review report and authorize adoption if +20% revenue lift shown

drift_detective.description: Scores outgoing drafts against Golden Archetype
drift_detective.l5_execution: Flags Drift Warning. CoS can pause publishing if Drift Score exceeds threshold

revenue_early_warning.l5_execution: Alerts L5 for intervention when thresholds breached

offer_sensitivity_scanner.l5_execution: L5 decides whether to adopt pricing changes

path_friction_analyzer.description: Checkout Resistance Mapping identifies friction points
path_friction_analyzer.l5_execution: L5 prioritizes which friction points to address

signal_to_noise_gatekeeper.l5_execution: L5 determines actions based on filtered signal queue

l6_predictive_layer.description: Predict user behavior, revenue velocity, churn risk, abandonment probability
l6_predictive_layer.constraint: Do not execute actions without L5 approval paths

l6_prioritization_engine.description: Rank leads, pages, or offers by attention priority
l6_prioritization_engine.constraint: L5 still determines action and thresholds

l6_sensory_expansion.description: Add more inputs (Stripe, Mailchimp, behavioral signals)

l6_simulation_mode.description: Run what-if scenarios predicting revenue impact

l6_safety_monitors.description: Watch for anomalies in revenue, API costs, or system drift

essence: L6 may see more, predict more, rank more, and advise more, but may NOT act outside L5's authority structure.
